Great torrent, works without any problems. I just had to change the language to English in the game menu.

just go to folder installation , open the steam_api  with text document and go to the last line, chance the language FROM Russian TO English. After that saved to the desktop first, delete the old "steam_api" and move the new one to the folder installation. (that because if you try to overwrite it doesn't accepted.)  Know from the game menu, you can chance and the voice language to english, Russian german.
cant get any english language ! i changed it in the steam.api file from russian to english but its all still in russian - and i cant figure out how to change it in the menu - any help ??

@remotehugger2
Try this: in the main menu click on the far right option (настройки - Options), then second from the top (Игра - Game Options) and then change Язык текстa and Язык голосa to English (английский).
lol if u want english then dont download setup4.bin. Just download the setup5.bin and thts it
